resources.string: Welcome to the magical developer panel. Something tells me you probably shouldn\'t be here..
Sit, walk or run, don\'t wobble.
Action can\'t be performed at this time.
Title and body can\'t be empty
Part of your thought title/body is empty.\nAre you sure you want to leave it this way?
There are no drafts. You will lose this thought. Are you sure?
There are always new ideas to build.
Google Material Design for icons.\nFreePik for incredible illustrations creative commons illustrations.

Please, don\'t be shy. Everyone needs a name.
"We're interested in understanding more about thoughts and the ideas of people."
"With Conscious we're trying to create a network for distributing thoughts and ideas." "\n\nIf you opt in you can anonymously share your thoughts in the future to help us in our goal."

"The goal of Conscious is to create a space for distributing intellectual ideas, anonymously." "\n\nWe want to facilitate inspiration and Aha! moments, and create a place for medium-length thought sharing"
"Conscious is a place to store your scattered longer-form thoughts, ideas and insights." "\n\nYou can search or explore your thoughts at any time."

"You can't edit or unthink your thoughts in real life." "

In Conscious, once you've committed a thought, it cannot be edited or deleted." "

All data is located on your phone, and there currently are no backups."
What is the point of Conscious?

"The goal of Conscious is to eventually create a space for distributing intellectual ideas, anonymously." "

We want to facilitate inspiration and Aha! moments, and create a place for medium-length thought sharing" "

Currently the program is being actively built."
"We're trying to understand thoughts better. " "\n\nBy opting in no personal information is tied back to your entries, but you give us permission to read and analyze the thoughts you commit."
You cannot change, edit or delete a thought after it has been committed.
Do not forget this PIN. There is currently no way to reset it.
There are no backups. If you forget your PIN you\'ll need to reset and lose everything.
If enabled, you can only access the app by entering a PIN.
Lock your thoughts in Conscious using a PIN only you know.
Silence time to wait after speech to record
